content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Barcelona 2.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Barcelona 2.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Foul by Rafinha (Barcelona).
Wellington Silva (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Verza (Almería).
Rafinha (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ximo Navarro (Almería).
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Fran Vélez (Almería).
Substitution, Almería. Wellington Silva replaces Thomas Partey.
Attempt missed. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ángel Trujillo.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic.
Goal!  Almería 1, Barcelona 2. Jordi Alba (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Luis Suárez with a cross.
Offside, Barcelona. Luis Suárez tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the bar with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Luis Suárez.

Substitution, Almería. Edgar Méndez replaces Thievy.
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a through ball.
Goal!  Almería 1, Barcelona 1. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Offside, Almería. Fran Vélez tries a through ball, but Tomer Hemed is caught offside.

Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ángel Trujillo.
Substitution, Almería. Tomer Hemed replaces Fernando Soriano.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernando Soriano (Almería).
Substitution, Barcelona. Xavi replaces Sergio Busquets because of an injury.

Fran Vélez (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).

Foul by Jonathan (Almería).

Jonathan (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Pedro (Barcelona).
Goal!  Almería 1, Barcelona 0. Thievy (Almería) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fernando Soriano with a through ball following a fast break.
